content: I wasn't saying remove social media, I think it's important to acknowledge the pivot and course correction since he didn't go viral. Ijust added the work "Strategy" to the Refining bullet to show we're not executing yet, but that's where we're going. I think with Alon, its fine to say something close to what you had initially, just not mention his name or company.  Automated outreach to AI experts before the post led to a confirmed meeting with one of the most respected minds in AI.
